## Overview

This report provides a reproducible pipeline for generating QR Codes in [R](https://www.r-project.org/).

See the code repository [README](https://github.com/danielvartan/qr-code#qr-code) to learn more about the implementation details.

> If you find this project useful, please consider giving it a star! [![GitHub repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/danielvartan/qr-code)](https://github.com/danielvartan/qr-code/)

## Set the Environment

```{r}
#| label: Set the Environment
#| output: false

library(here)
library(magick)
library(qrcode)
library(rsvg)
```

```{r}
#| include: false

library(downlit)
library(xml2)
```

```{r}
#| include: false

"https://linktr.ee/danielvartan" |>
  qr_code(ecl = "H") |>
  generate_svg(
    filename = here("images", "favicon.svg"),
    size = 500 # in pixels
  )
```

## Generate the QR Code

```{r}
#| label: Generate QR Code

"https://linktr.ee/danielvartan" |>
  qr_code(ecl = "H") |>
  add_logo(
    logo = here("images", "linktree-icon.svg"),
    ecl = "L"
  ) |>
  generate_svg(
    filename = here("images", "qr-code.svg"),
    size = 530,
    show = FALSE
  )
```

![](images/qr-code.svg){fig-align="center" style="width: 50%"}

## Add a Frame

```{r}
#| label: Add Frame

qr_code <-
  here("images", "qr-code.svg") |>
  image_read() |>
  image_trim()
```

```{r}
image_info(qr_code)
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| include: false

image_display(qr_code)
```

```{r}
frame <-
  here("images", "frame.svg") |>
  image_read()
```

```{r}
image_info(frame)
```

```{r}
composite <- image_composite(
  image = frame,
  composite_image = qr_code,
  offset = "+50+50"
)
```

```{r}
image_info(composite)
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| include: false

image_display(composite)
```

```{r}
composite |>
  image_write(
    path = here("images", "qr-code-composite.png"),
    format = "png",
    quality = 100,
    flatten = TRUE
  )
```

![](images/qr-code-composite.png){fig-align="center" style="width: 50%"}
